name: Hastur's Sceptre (1h)
data: It has good weapon class for its type (feeble in general).
It increases the users wisdom a good amount.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
The ancient wisdom of the sceptre helps its wielder create and exploit
